binary.title: Binary Quest
binary.heroText: Answer yes or no, simple as that! Try to get a high streak!

compare.title: Comparator
compare.heroText: Compare the two items and guess which one has the greater value. Try to get the highest streak that you can.

connect.title: Category Connect
connect.heroText: Group tiles that share a common category. Match all four tiles to win!

geoguessr.title: GeoGuessr
geoguessr.heroText: Guess where I took these photos! When you're ready, make your guess and see how close you were.

map.title: Map Mania
map.heroText: How many locations can you name in a short time?

match.title: Match Master
match.heroText: Match tiles that are part of the same group. Try to complete all pairings as quickly as possible!

selection.title: Selection Showdown
selection.heroText: Select all the correct answers from the list. Try to get a high score!

streak.title: Streak Master
streak.heroText: How many answers can you get in a row? Test your knowledge with these quizzes and see how high of a streak you can get!
